entry.title: I love you
entry.summary:
Author: FishMagee

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,515Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 56

Summary: Maddie’s worried that history is repeating itself when she learns that Buck is moving into Eddie’s house, but Buck brushes her concerns off. He can’t focus on anything but helping Eddie move - but then it’s finally time to say goodbye and Buck tells Eddie, “I love you.”But in a “best friend” way, of course.Post s8ep9 fic, using some of the leaks as inspiration. (Started before s8ep10, and continued as s8 is releasing) Eventual Eddie POV.

entry.title: hold the line
entry.summary:
Author: roseblushheart

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,945Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Less than a week in this house, and Buck has already decided that most of the things that happened in it are best kept quiet from its original tenant. Things that will probably be really funny in the future, when the world has stopped feeling like it’s been turned upside down. Things like ‘I didn’t want to unpack for days because it would be confirmation that you’re really gone’ and ‘I slept at my sister’s house for several nights because, once again, I didn’t want to believe you actually left’ and ‘said sister and my ex asked if I’m in love with you, for some reason?’ and ‘oh, by the way, I had sex with that ex in your bedroom and that was the first night I could actually get some sleep here, whatever that means’. Buck deals with a series of secrets and phone calls, while living in a house that likes to remind him of how his his best friend is gone every chance it gets.Set immediately after 8x11.

entry.title: The Wild Boy
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,890Chapters: 22/28Kudos: 586

Summary: The 118 get a call to some nearby woodlands where the police are waiting for their assistance. Athena tells them that they need to help with a little boy that had gotten his leg stuck in a beartrap. All seems simple but then she tells them that the boy is a feral child, animalistic and frightened, and was throwing rocks at people who tried to get closer. Buck and Eddie are tasked to get him to safety.The boy is scared of everything around him, people, sounds, objects, the wind, the smells. Terror is all the boy knew until he found something he wasn’t scared of.And its name was Evan Buckley. :3Warnings - Heavy descriptions of medical trauma, child abuse, neglect and injury.Queue found family, Christopher being an amazing big brother and the 118 being the best family in the entire world. :3

entry.title: i’m not angry anymore (well, sometimes i am)
entry.summary:
Author: chimeras

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,049Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Before either of them were firefighters, Buck and Eddie met in Peru where Buck was bartending and Eddie was working construction. Then, out of nowhere, Eddie disappeared. No call, no text, no note, no explanation. So, Buck moved on.Until Eddie becomes the newest probationary firefighter at LAFD’s station 118.Situations like that are hard to forget, as well as the anger, resentment, and maybe a little self-blame. But the fiery hatred that burns under their reunion seems to set something else off — something a little more productive…***title is the paramore song "Interlude: I'm Not Angry Anymore"

entry.title: Lighthouse
entry.summary:
Author: KilldevilandtheWildThings

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 137,073Chapters: 26/32Kudos: 1,018

Summary: Buck had lost-- he was sure of this now. His resolve only lasted a few weeks before his exterior began to crack; he was never a very good actor. He couldn’t keep up the greetings and the asking questions and the easy stroll. He let his shoulders creep up to his ears, let his foot tap incessantly. He did what his Captain told him, but stopped asking for anything more. Stopped following the conversation in the back of the engine on the way to the call; he just stared out the window, thinking about the case to come, preparing for it. When he woke every morning, there was no big recovery milestone to strive for, no big fight for the soul of his career to win. Not even the happy swell of being back on shift -- something so easy to dismiss, that had dominated so much of his life, that he had taken for granted-- that had catalyzed him each morning of his first week back.An old habit of his had returned. A bad habit.~~or: after the lawsuit, buck confronts what it was he wanted all along. he looks and looks and longs for it; the team looks right through him. buck breaks-- right down the middle.

entry.title: stay alive, open wide
entry.summary:
Author: dogfishmonger

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,839Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 87

Summary: He feels like shit when he's hungry, and he plays better when he's empty. The cold air doesn't touch him as much. The floodlights turn silvery-soft.And he likes eating. Keeps his hands busy, mouth busy, mind busy. Something to chew through, putty in the ears.Go until you can't anymore. Cycle it back out. Be ready.  --OR: Buck's had on-again, off-again bulimia since he was 14.--Updates on Wednesdays. Yes, the title has changed! It is still from Psychic Friend's "We Do Not Belong".

entry.summary:
Author: buttercupkisses

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,616Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 27

Summary: “So Buck, would you like to share anything with the group? It can be as little or as much as you feel comfortable doing.”“Me?”Amelie nods encouraging him to go on, “Well as I mentioned I am here because of my best friend. His name is Eddie. And he’s like the best dad, right? He’s doing it all on his own, the upbringing, the school events everything and Christopher, his son, he’s just amazing. This year he even won the science contest at his school with me and his dad only stepping in when he wanted to involve fire.”OR post 8x11 Buck decides to join a bereavement group in an attempt to meet likeminded people. entry.title: The Chosen and the Cursed
entry.summary:
Author: ThisGayGeek22

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,581Chapters: 1/15Kudos: 7

Summary: A solar eclipse marks the beginning.A fire changes everything.And one impossible moment shatters the illusion of normalcy.When Buck is gravely injured during a rescue, something ancient stirs—something buried deep in his blood. As his body begins to heal at a rate no doctor can explain, the 118 is pulled into a world of magic, secrets, and destiny.Eddie feels the shift too—power waking in his bones, in his blood. And the bond between him and Buck? It was never just friendship. Not really.As the veil between worlds thins, Buck and Eddie must confront the truth of who they are—what they were always meant to be—and the powerful connection tying them together.This was never just an accident.It was the beginning.
